author: wtopstaff
title: Magic-Pacers, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 8, 2015 9:32 pm ORLANDO (92) 
Fournier 3-11 1-1 9, Harris 6-9 0-0 12, Vucevic 6-12 1-2 13, Payton 3-9 0-1 6, Oladipo 6-12 0-0 15, Hezonja 3-7 0-0 7, Marble 3-10 1-2 8, Nicholson 1-5 0-0 3, Dedmon 2-5 0-0 4, Napier 4-5 2-2 13, Sibert 0-0 0-0 0, Egwu 1-2 0-0 2, Appling 0-1 0-0 0. Totals 38-88 5-8 92. INDIANA (97) 
Miles 5-17 2-4 14, George 4-14 4-6 13, Mahinmi 4-4 0-2 8, Ellis 3-6 6-7 12, Robinson III 3-5 5-6 14, Allen 2-3 0-0 4, Stuckey 1-3 2-2 4, Turner 3-7 0-0 6, Young 2-7 4-4 9, J.Hill 5-7 0-0 10, Fair 0-2 0-0 0, Douglas 0-1 0-0 0, Whittington 0-1 0-0 0, Christmas 1-3 1-1 3. Totals 33-80 24-32 97. Orlando 24 31 16 21—92 Indiana 27 20 27 23—97 
3-Point Goals_Orlando 11-27 (Napier 3-3, Oladipo 3-6, Fournier 2-6, Nicholson 1-3, Hezonja 1-4, Marble 1-5), Indiana 7-29 (Robinson III 3-4, Miles 2-9, Young 1-3, George 1-8, Fair 0-1, Turner 0-1, Stuckey 0-1, Douglas 0-1, Whittington 0-1). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_Orlando 53 (Harris 13), Indiana 55 (Mahinmi 9). Assists_Orlando 20 (Vucevic, Payton, Marble 4), Indiana 19 (Ellis 7). Total Fouls_Orlando 23, Indiana 12. Technicals_Orlando defensive three second 2. A_13,475 (18,165). Topics:
